DataElement.preferredName: Orthodontist Patient Compliance Sensor Participation  Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes or No response to whether the orthodontist would object to a sensor being placed in the removable retainer to monitor patient compliance.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The orthodontist's objection to a sensor being placed in the removable retainer to monitor patient compliance.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of malocclusions of the teeth and their surrounding structures.

Concepts.definition: A dentist specializing in the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of malocclusions of the teeth and their surrounding structures.

Property.preferredDefinition: Patient Compliance is the extent to which the patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.:A device that responds to a stimulus, such as heat, light, or pressure, and generates a signal that can be measured or interpreted.:Taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: The extent to which a patient conforms to medical advice regarding prescribed regimen, lifestyle, dietary changes, follow-up schedule and other recommendations.
A device that responds to a stimulus, such as heat, light, or pressure, and generates a signal that can be measured or interpreted.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: PRECEDENT CRF:Practice-based Research Collaborative in Evidence-Based Dentistry Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Response of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/15/08 - Associated NCIt concets for Yes/No instead of Meta.  Superceded existing VD.

ReferenceDocuments.name: A sensor can be placed within
ReferenceDocuments.description: A sensor can be placed within a retainer to monitor patient compliance. Would you object to the use of such a device to monitor patient compliance

DataElement.origin: PRECEDENT CRF:Practice-based Research Collaborative in Evidence-Based Dentistry Case Report Form
